\documentclass[10pt,xelatex,10pt,a4paper]{bxjsarticle}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amsthm}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{fontspec}
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\setcounter{tocdepth}{2}
\usepackage{mathtools}

\makeatletter
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% Textclass specific LaTeX commands.
\newlength{\lyxlabelwidth}      % auxiliary length 

\@ifundefined{date}{}{\date{}}
\AtBeginDocument{
  \def\labelitemii{\tiny\(\blacksquare\)}
  \def\labelitemiii{\scriptsize\(\blacktriangleright\)}
}

\makeatother


\begin{document}
\begin{align*}
\frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}t} & =\frac{p}{m}\\
\frac{\mathrm{d}p}{\mathrm{d}t} & =-\frac{\gamma}{m}p-kx
\end{align*}

\begin{align*}
\frac{x_{i+1}-x_{i}}{\Delta t} & -\frac{p_{i+1}+p_{i}}{m}=0\\
\frac{p_{i+1}-p_{i}}{\Delta t} & +\frac{\gamma}{m}\frac{p_{i+1}+p_{i}}{2}+k\frac{x_{i+1}+x_{i}}{2}=0
\end{align*}

\end{document}
